name: 3-D Ultra Pinball: Creep Night
summary:
Pinball with a strong horror motif. In the 3-D Ultra Pinball tradition, many of the effects achieved on these tables could not be reproduced on traditional machines. 
There are even cutaways to mini-video games where you can rack up bonus points. 
Tables can be played individually, or all at once in a campaign to beat them.
